TABLE.NAME: tool_openveo_migration
TABLE.COMMENT: The list of Moodle files selected to be migrated and their actual status in the migration process

FIELD.NAME: filesid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of a Moodle file in files table

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The migration status of the file

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The migration state of the file

FIELD.NAME: filename
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the migrated video

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: The context id of the plugin instance owning the video

KEY.NAME: filesid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the id field of the files table
